channel.title: Anyone who is familiar with azn cheat client please help
channel.description: well i jsut got it and when i try to connect to a server i go to: azn client<change server and type in the ip like *******.no-ip.biz and it always says when i try to login: unexpected server responce attempting to reconect i will do anything for help even give donation :)

item.title: Anyone who is familiar with azn cheat client please help
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

I even wrote my own Cheat Client around 2 days ago.
ALL servers I tried it on are immune to the best bit, the item spawning - That was the main feature, l0l.

The moral of the story, even custom cheat clients don’t really work.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone who is familiar with azn cheat client please help

item.title: Anyone who is familiar with azn cheat client please help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

i0wn3v3ry:

Decompile the client, get the UID.

That could be changed to anything. And even if they did allow it to connect, there should ALWAYS be input validation by the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone who is familiar with azn cheat client please help
item.dc:creator: @avirunes avirunes
item.description:
@avirunes wrote:

Like mentioned, nearly all servers even the crappy ones only allow their client and webclient to connect, and send a crashframe packet when you connect with anything else. You can try connect to your victim server via the online mopar client and if it kicks you off of that then thats most likely the problem.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone who is familiar with azn cheat client please help

item.title: Anyone who is familiar with azn cheat client please help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

gamepowner12:

well i jsut got it and when i try to connect to a server i go to: azn client<change server and type in the ip like *******.no-ip.biz and it always says when i try to login: unexpected server responce attempting to reconect i will do anything for help even give donation

Any well programmed server would pretty much be immune to a cheat client. The most that you could do in a well programmed server is bot. And even then, I’m sure the server would be able to tell and take appropriate action.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone who is familiar with azn cheat client please help
